t: The Blessed State of the Righteous
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Blessed*ln is*i the man who*i fears the Lord,*s Who*ild delights greatly in His commandments.
His*ln descendants will be mighty on earth; The*ld generation of the upright will be blessed.
Wealth*ld and riches will*i be*i in his house, And*ld his righteousness endures forever.
Unto*ld the upright there arises light in the darkness; He*ild is*i gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
A*ld good man deals graciously and lends; He*ld will guide his affairs with discretion.
Surely*ld he will never be shaken; The*ld righteous will be in everlasting remembrance.
He*ld will not be afraid of evil tidings; His*ld heart is steadfast, trusting in the Lord.*s
His*ld heart is*i established; He*ld will not be afraid, Until*ld he sees his*i desire*i upon his enemies.
He*ln has dispersed abroad, He*ld has given to the poor; His*ld righteousness endures forever; His*ld horn will be exalted with honor.
The*ld wicked will see it*i and be grieved; He*ld will gnash his teeth and melt away; The*ld desire of the wicked shall perish.
